plugins.name: Designer Performance Score
plugins.description:
🎯 Designer Performance Score

An advanced tool to help design teams and leads evaluate UI/UX designer efficiency across three key metrics:


  1. Acceptance Rate: How many screens got approved vs. how many were designed.
  2. Revised Rate: How many times a screen got revised before acceptance.
  3. UI Screens per Scenario: How many screens are created for each user scenario.


🔧 Comes with adjustable thresholds for each metric, dynamic feedback, and color-coded results to quickly detect efficiency bottlenecks.


Perfect for performance reviews, retrospectives, or mentoring sessions.


📚 Inspired by https://sedatcakir.net/blog/tasarimcinin-performansi-nasil-olculur
plugins.tagline: Score your design work using real metrics like acceptance rate and revision frequency.

140432.tagline: Score your design work using real metrics like acceptance rate and revision frequency.

plugins.name: FigmaLint
plugins.description:
FigmaLint is an AI-powered design analysis tool that helps designers and developers create more consistent, accessible, and production-ready components.


Key Features:

  1. 🔍 Component Analysis - Get instant insights into component structure, properties, states, and design token usage
  2. 💬 AI Chat Assistant - Ask questions about design systems, best practices, and get contextual help
  3. 🎯 MCP Integration - Enhanced analysis with design systems knowledge for better recommendations
  4. 🏆 Audit Scoring - Comprehensive scoring for accessibility, consistency, and code-readiness
  5. 🎨 Token Analysis - Identify hard-coded values and get semantic token recommendations
  6. 📋 Property Documentation - Auto-generate property sheets and developer handoff documentation


Perfect for:

  1. Design system teams building scalable component libraries
  2. Developers who need clear component specifications
  3. Designers wanting to improve component quality and consistency
  4. Teams looking to streamline design-to-code handoff


How it works:

  1. Select any component in your Figma file
  2. Click "Analyze" to get instant insights
  3. Review recommendations for improvements
  4. Use the AI chat for specific questions
  5. Export documentation for developers


FigmaLint uses Claude AI to provide intelligent analysis and the MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for design systems best practices, ensuring your components are production-ready and follow industry standards.

accepted.name: TJ Pitre
accepted.description: Connecting the dots between design systems, AI, and the product development lifecycle.

plugins.tagline: AI-powered component analysis and design systems chat for Figma

plugins.name: TextFiller
plugins.description:
TextFiller helps you update multiple text layers with just one click. Perfect for designers working with text-heavy interfaces, landing pages, or any project with repetitive content updates.


✨ Key Features:

  1. Bulk update multiple text layers in one click
  2. Preserves all text formatting (fonts, sizes, colors, spacing)
  3. Smart name-based matching - no more manual copy-paste
  4. Clear feedback on applied changes
  5. Simple format: just paste "texto1: Your content here"


📝 How it works:

#1 - Name your text layers as "texto1", "texto2", "texto3"...

#2 - Paste your content in the plugin using the format:

texto1: Your headline here

texto2: Your description here

texto3: Call to action text

#3 - Click apply and watch the magic happen!


Perfect for:

  1. Landing pages with multiple text variations
  2. A/B testing different copy
  3. Localizing designs to multiple languages
  4. Updating placeholder text with real content
  5. Design systems with text templates


Save hours of repetitive work. Let TextFiller handle the boring stuff while you focus on design.
plugins.tagline: Apply multiple texts with one click while preserving styles

139563.description:

plugins.name: Screen Count
plugins.description:
Screen Count updates the numbers on your screen labels based on position (top to bottom, left to right). Just add the name of the label container, select the flow or frame you want to update, and hit "Renumber".


You can now use letters instead of numbers or choose to append to the existing text rather than replace it.
plugins.tagline: Updated screen numbering for flows in a couple clicks

You can now use letters instead of numbers or choose to append to the existing text rather than replace it.

plugins.name: Design Rule Checker
plugins.description:
デザインシステムの一貫性を保つための自動チェックツールです。Figmaファイル内のデザイン要素を自動でスキャンし、設定されたデザインルールに違反している箇所を瞬時に検出します。


使い方

チェックしたい要素、または、ページを選択し「チェック開始」ボタンをクリック。

ルールに違反している要素の一覧が表示されたら、クリックして修正箇所を確認する。


主な機能

6つのチェック項目

  1. カラー: ライブラリ変数やスタイルが正しく適用されているかチェック
  2. フォント: 許可されたフォントファミリーとウェイトが使用されているかチェック
  3. 余白: 4pxグリッドに準拠した余白設定かチェック
  4. ボーダー: 適切なボーダー設定がされているかチェック
  5. サイズ: 4pxグリッドに準拠したサイズ設定かチェック
  6. レイアウト: オートレイアウトや制約が正しく設定されているかチェック


高度なフィルタリング機能

  1. 違反の種類別フィルタリング
  2. フレーム別フィルタリング
  3. レイヤー名での検索機能
  4. リアルタイムプレビュー
  5. カスタマイズ可能な設定
  6. 各チェック項目のON/OFF切り替え
  7. チェック対象ノードタイプの選択
  8. 非表示レイヤーの含む/含まない設定


使用シーン

  1. デザインシステムの品質管理
  2. チーム開発でのデザイン一貫性確保
  3. デザインレビュー前の事前チェック
  4. 新規メンバーのデザインルール教育


特徴

  1. 直感的なUI: ダークモード/ライトモード対応の美しいインターフェース
  2. 高速スキャン: 大量のレイヤーも素早くチェック
  3. 詳細な報告: 違反箇所をワンクリックでフォーカス
  4. 柔軟な設定: プロジェクトに合わせたカスタマイズが可能

デザインの品質向上とチームの生産性向上に貢献する、デザイナー必携のツールです。
plugins.tagline: デザインルール自動チェッカー

139447.tagline: デザインルール自動チェッカー

plugins.name: Corner Radius Balancer
plugins.description:
Corner Radius Balancer

Tired of manually calculating corner radius for nested elements in Auto Layout? 😩

This plugin helps you automatically balance the corner radius relationship between a parent frame and its child element, based on the simple formula: Parent Radius = Child Radius + Padding.


How it Works

The plugin simplifies your workflow by linking the three key values. When you adjust one, the others intelligently update:

Adjust Parent Radius

Padding remains fixed, and Child Radius updates automatically.

Adjust Padding

Parent Radius remains fixed, and Child Radius updates automatically.

Adjust Child Radius

Padding remains fixed, and Parent Radius updates automatically.


Key Features

Quick Fix Button ⚡

Instantly corrects the corner radius relationship with a single click.

Real-time Preview

See your changes on the canvas as you make them in the plugin.

Sync with Figma UI

Changes made directly in Figma's properties panel are reflected in the plugin.

Supports Various Corner Patterns

Works with uniform, partial, and custom corner radii by preserving the differences between them.


How to Use 📝

Select a Parent Frame

Choose a parent frame that uses Auto Layout and contains a child rectangle.

Adjust Values

Use the sliders or input fields in the plugin to adjust the values.

Complete

Click "Done" when finished.
plugins.tagline: Automatically adjust nested corner radius values.

plugins.name: Token Exporter Pro
plugins.description:
Export Figma color, gradient, and shadow tokens with one click — no fluff, just clean, dev-ready output.


Choose your naming convention (camelCase, PascalCase, dot.notation…), match your framework (React, Tailwind, or plain CSS), and get tokens you can actually use.


Includes:

✅ Linear & radial gradients (with angles)

✅ Shadow exports (drop & inner)

✅ Format-ready for Tailwind, JSON, and SCSS

✅ Works great with Style Dictionary or custom configs


Perfect for design system handoffs, developer styling, and anyone who’s tired of manually formatting hex codes.
plugins.tagline: Export design tokens from Figma — with naming styles, framework formats, gradients & shadows.

138641.description:

Includes:

✅ Linear & radial gradients (with angles)

plugins.name: Annotate Flow
plugins.description:
Annotate Flow allows you to quickly and conveniently add numbered markers and text comments to any objects in Figma. Ideal for:

  1. conducting reviews,
  2. creating guides,
  3. visually explaining interface elements.


Functionality:

  1. A marker with a number automatically appears next to the selected object.
  2. The comment is placed separately outside the frame and does not fall inside the UI layers.
  3. Ability to choose the background and text color for annotations.
  4. Font size selector for comment text.
  5. “Reset Counter” button to start annotations from 1.
  6. Convenient and intuitive interface.


🧩 Works with any layers and components. No configuration required — just select an object and click “ADD ANNOTATION”.
plugins.tagline: Instantly create numbered markers and comments with color settings to annotate, explain any design.

137708.name: Annotate Flow
137708.description:
Annotate Flow allows you to quickly and conveniently add numbered markers and text comments to any objects in Figma. Ideal for:

  1. conducting reviews,
  2. creating guides,
  3. visually explaining interface elements.


Functionality:

  1. A marker with a number automatically appears next to the selected object.
  2. The comment is placed separately outside the frame and does not fall inside the UI layers.
  3. Ability to choose the background and text color for annotations.
  4. Font size selector for comment text.
  5. “Reset Counter” button to start annotations from 1.
  6. Convenient and intuitive interface.


🧩 Works with any layers and components. No configuration required — just select an object and click “ADD ANNOTATION”.
137708.release_notes:
v2.0 – Refined UI & Enhanced Functionality

🎨 Clean and modern user interface redesign

🔢 Annotation numbering now persists across sessions

🔤 Font size selector for comment text

🔒 Toggle to lock/unlock all frames on the page

🧹 “Reset Counter” button to start annotations from 1

🛠 General UX refinements and performance improvements
137708.tagline: Instantly create numbered markers and comments with color settings to annotate, explain any design.

plugins.name: Grammar AI
plugins.description:

plugins.name: Thumbly
plugins.description:
Thumbly — Instant Project Thumbnails

Create beautiful project thumbnails — fast and professional. This plugin helps you generate stunning thumbnail covers for your projects, presentations, and portfolio content directly in Figma.


No need to design covers from scratch. Just enter your title, description, pick an emoji, choose a theme — and Thumbly generates a ready-to-use thumbnail frame in seconds.


Key features:

  1. Instant thumbnail generation with custom text
  2. 100+ project-themed emojis to choose from
  3. Light and dark theme presets
  4. Optimized 1920×960px cover size
  5. Built-in Auto Layout for precise structure

accepted.name: Pavel Grachev
accepted.description: Product designer. Focused on clarity, usability, and quality design systems.

plugins.tagline: Effortless thumbnail design for every project.

137647.name: Thumbly
137647.description:
Thumbly — Instant Project Thumbnails

Create beautiful project thumbnails — fast and professional. This plugin helps you generate stunning thumbnail covers for your projects, presentations, and portfolio content directly in Figma.


No need to design covers from scratch. Just enter your title, description, pick an emoji, choose a theme — and Thumbly generates a ready-to-use thumbnail frame in seconds.


Key features:

  1. Instant thumbnail generation with custom text
  2. 100+ project-themed emojis to choose from

137647.tagline: Effortless thumbnail design for every project.

plugins.name: Rename by text list
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you rename multiple layers in bulk using a text-based list.

Simply select two Auto Layout frames:

  1. One containing the elements to rename (any layer type)
  2. One containing text nodes with the desired names

The plugin will rename each element in the first frame using the corresponding text content from the second frame, based on their order in the layers panel.
plugins.tagline: Rename one list of items by another list of text items

137516.name: Rename by text list
137516.description:

Simply select two Auto Layout frames:

  1. One containing the elements to rename (any layer type)
  2. One containing text nodes with the desired names

The plugin will rename each element in the first frame using the corresponding text content from the second frame, based on their order in the layers panel.
137516.tagline: Rename one list of items by another list of text items

plugins.name: Component Description Search
plugins.description: Figma lets you add rich descriptions to your components—but the built-in search only looks at layer names, component titles, and text nodes. Component Description Search fills the gap: instantly find and filter components by their descriptions, right inside your Figma file.
plugins.tagline: Finally search within your component descriptions

136687.description: Figma lets you add rich descriptions to your components—but the built-in search only looks at layer names, component titles, and text nodes. Component Description Search fills the gap: instantly find and filter components by their descriptions, right inside your Figma file.
136687.tagline: Finally search within your component descriptions

plugins.name: Layer Query
plugins.description:
A powerful layer selection plugin that lets you find and select layers based on their design properties and custom component properties. Perfect for managing large design files and design systems efficiently.


## Key Features


- Multi-property search with combination filters

- Custom component property support (boolean, text, variant, instance swap)

- Flexible search scope: Entire file, Current page, Root frame, or Selected frames

- Search results with page grouping and navigation

- Real-time search progress with cancellation support

- Cross-page layer selection and navigation


## Supported Properties


**Typography:** Font size, font family, line height, text alignment, text content

**Fill:** Fill color, opacity

**Size:** Width, height

**Padding:** All directions (top, bottom, left, right, vertical, horizontal)

**Auto Layout:** Direction, sizing, alignment, item spacing

**Stroke:** Stroke color, stroke width

**Corner Radius:** All corners and individual corner values

**Layer:** Layer name, structure, type, opacity

**Position:** X and Y coordinates

**Custom:** Component instance properties


## Perfect For


- Design system maintenance and auditing

- Finding layers with specific styling across large files

- Quality assurance and design consistency checks

- Efficient layer organization and cleanup

- Component property management


Save hours of manual searching with precise property-based queries. Transform your Figma workflow from manual hunting to smart selection.


## Beta Version


This plugin is currently in beta. Please report any issues or feedback to help improve the experience.
plugins.tagline: Query and select layers by properties including custom components. Advanced search for efficiency.

plugins.name: 📝 Text Export / Import (JSON)
plugins.description: Easily export all text layers from your Figma designs into a clean JSON format — and import them back just as smoothly. Export from selected frames or the entire document, with options to include or skip locked layers. Perfect for localization, content updates, or developer handoff.
plugins.tagline: Text to JSON. JSON to Text. Simple.

136667.name: 📝 Text Export / Import (JSON)
136667.description: Easily export all text layers from your Figma designs into a clean JSON format — and import them back just as smoothly. Export from selected frames or the entire document, with options to include or skip locked layers. Perfect for localization, content updates, or developer handoff.
136667.release_notes:
UI Update:
The plugin interface is now cleaner and more user-friendly: instructions and selection info are clearly aligned and spaced, all main blocks have equal margins, and paddings are unified for a balanced look. The selection block stands out with a soft background and rounded corners, making export/import actions more intuitive and visually appealing.
136667.tagline: Text to JSON. JSON to Text. Simple.

plugins.description:

Copies the selected frame, applies the suffix, and hides text and UI components meant to be hidden in the duplicate.

plugins.name: Human Design Map Builder
plugins.description:
This plugin is part of a structured system for generating personalized Human Design maps inside Figma.

It reads structured data from a frame called INPUT_PANEL and dynamically updates the cover, highlights centers, colors gates, and reveals matching sections based on the data.

It ends by copying all relevant sections to a target page (מפות מעודכנות) for final output.

No data is sent to external services, except for a success/failure status posted to a webhook for internal workflow tracking.

This plugin is tailored for a specific document structure and may not function properly outside that context.
plugins.tagline: Automatically build and assemble custom sections inside your Figma based on predefined data fields.

137361.name: Human Design Map Builder
137361.description:
This plugin is part of a structured system for generating personalized Human Design maps inside Figma.

It reads structured data from a frame called INPUT_PANEL and dynamically updates the cover, highlights centers, colors gates, and reveals matching sections based on the data.

It ends by copying all relevant sections to a target page (מפות מעודכנות) for final output.

No data is sent to external services, except for a success/failure status posted to a webhook for internal workflow tracking.

This plugin is tailored for a specific document structure and may not function properly outside that context.
137361.release_notes:
MAP BUILDER – Version 1.1
Release Notes

Added secure status reporting using dynamic tokens pulled directly from the design panel.

Improved user feedback with clearer notifications throughout the map-building process.

Minor bug fixes and internal stability enhancements.
137361.tagline: Automatically build and assemble custom sections inside your Figma based on predefined data fields.

✨ More Realistic Street Numbers

plugins.name: Zephyr Export
plugins.description: Exports a section with all its images as an atlas to the Defold engine. Before exporting, it wraps images into frames, all existing frames into components, adds TYPE TYPE_BOX property to all components and sets constraints scale (scale is not set if stretch is set). After that you can use your components in the zephyr plugin
plugins.tagline: Figma to defold atlas exporter

140157.name: Zephyr Export
140157.description: Exports a section with all its images as an atlas to the Defold engine. Before exporting, it wraps images into frames, all existing frames into components, adds TYPE TYPE_BOX property to all components and sets constraints scale (scale is not set if stretch is set). After that you can use your components in the zephyr plugin

networkAccess.reasoning: Plugin can send files on the web server. This is used in order to save all the necessary files at once in the desired directory with one click.

Identify potential regulatory issues early in your design process and create compliant marketing materials with confidence. plugins.name: Content Generator
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you replace selected text layers with smart, AI-generated content based on your own descriptions. No more lorem ipsum—just real, context-aware mock text that fits your design.


How to use

Select one or more text layers, then enter the kind of content you'd like to generate—like “names,” “job titles,” or “short bios”—and the plugin will fill them in instantly.
plugins.tagline: Generate realistic text content in Figma instantly—based on your own prompts.

plugins.name: Section Template Manager
plugins.description:
Section Template Manager streamlines your daily workflow in FigJam by automatically duplicating template sections with today's date. Perfect for teams who use FigJam for daily stand-ups, retrospectives, or any recurring activities.


Key Features:

• One-click duplication - No UI, just instant action

• Automatic dating - New sections are named with today's date (YYYY-MM-DD)

• Smart organization - Existing dated sections automatically shift to maintain chronological order

• Template flexibility - Any section starting with "TEMPLATE" becomes a reusable template


How it works:

1. Create a section with a name starting with "TEMPLATE"

2. Run the plugin

3. Your template is duplicated with today's date, and existing sections are organized


Perfect for:

• Daily KPT (Keep/Problem/Try) retrospectives

• Team stand-up meetings

• Weekly reports and reviews

• Project status tracking

• Any recurring documentation needs


Save time and maintain consistency in your team's documentation workflow. No more manual copying or renaming - let Section Template Manager handle the repetitive tasks so you can focus on what matters.
plugins.tagline: Organize your daily sections with one click
